question: Please analyze this URL https://cryptoassetrecovery.com/
thought: I need to check the content of the website to see if it exhibits any characteristics of a scam website. The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks to analyze the content for any scam characteristics. The website does not exhibit characteristics of a scam website based on the content. {

answer.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The content is focused on wallet recovery services and provides detailed information on the process pricing and frequently asked questions. There are no claims of free money low prices or non-existent companies. The website appears to be legitimate and does not raise any red flags.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
